‚Äòmawbima‚Äô saha ‚Äòkhgnyarathadhada eedhanyachara‚Äô yana lankawe pramukha jathika puwathpath mudranaya kota bedaharina simasahitha silon niwuspepars (prayiwat) limitad aayathanayen rupiyal koti 150k ayakara ganu pinisa maha nagara saha basnahira sanwardhana amathi patali champika ranawaka wisin kolambaa disa adhikaranaye panawa thibu apahasa nadu 02k pasugiya brahaspathinda (07da) ohu wisinma illa askara ganimen pasuwa eewa gasthu rahithawama nishprabha kirimata pasugiya 7 wanida kolambaa disa adhikarana winisuru jatila rathnayaka mahatha niyoga kaleya.
